name: Artists.Attributes
desc: The attributes for an artist resource.

items.name: editorialNotes
items.desc: The notes about the artist that appear in the Apple Music catalog.

items.name: genreNames
items.desc: The names of the genres associated with this artist.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the artist.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for sharing the artist in Apple Music.
